item.title: UNYIELDER ‘Boss Rush’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Boss-rush roguelite shooter due out on September 29.

Publisher Shueisha Games and developer TrueWorld Studios have released a new trailer for boss-rush roguelite first-person shooter action game UNYIELDER showcasing some of the game’s more than 40 bosses.

Get the latest details below.

Boss Rush

In the new UNYIELDER Boss trailer, get a glimpse of the game’s core action: intense one-versus-one boss battles against more than 40 unique foes, each armed with distinct attack patterns and combat styles. Find out about the five playable characters, each with their own abilities, and learn about the innovative Boss Crafting system, where players forge powerful custom endgame bosses based on their previous encounters.

Over 40 Bosses Across Four Archetypes

From towering mechs to looming shadow-beasts UNYIELDER throws players into relentless one-versus-one arena duels, against over 40 distinct bosses, where each encounter is a trial of skill and survival. These formidable foes span four deadly archetypes:

  • Minor Bosses – Early-game encounters with more accessible attack patterns.
  • Major Bosses – Highly difficult mid-bosses that drop Data Drives for crafting.
  • Special Bosses – Secret bosses that emerge only when specific conditions are met.
  • Legendary Bosses – Custom-crafted end bosses with three variations, based on player decisions.

Five Unique Characters to Unlock

Starting their adventure with one character, players can unlock the other four heroes over time, each with their unique movement styles, loadouts and special skills. Take a different strategic approach with each run depending on your character choice!

  • Pretender: Gatling – A well-rounded mid-range fighter.
  • Pretender: Thumper – A tank with high HP, shield strength and aerial mobility.
  • Skinner – A high-risk melee fighter who gains buffs from successful dodges.
  • Rali – A charge-based powerhouse that deals massive burst damage.
  • Rain – A close-combat guardian who parries and counters with precision timing.

Craft Your Legendary Boss Challenge

Collect Data Drives as you defeat Major Bosses, which can be used in the Legendary Arena, a late-game area, where you can craft your own unique end boss. Experiment with different “Data Drive” combinations to summon new bosses, with rare pairings unlocking unique variant forms offering limitless endgame replayability!

UNYIELDER is due out for PC via Steam on September 29.

item.title: 70s retro sci-fi action adventure game Cosmo Tales announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Due out in Early Access in 2026.

Bohemia Interactive has announced Cosmo Tales, a third-person action adventure game inspired by 70s retro science-fiction aesthetic, mixed with modern looks and gameplay. It will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Cosmo Tales is a brand-new take on space combat! Shift dimensions and change reality as a teenage driver in his witty sentient cosmobile. Embark on a fast-paced, dimension-shifting adventure full of whimsical stories.

Shift Dimensions. Change Everything.

You’re not just speeding through space—you’re rewiring it. Shift between alternate versions of reality in an instant; escape ambushes, solve environmental puzzles, or turn the tide of otherwise impossible combat. Every dimension has its own rules, visuals, weapons, enemy interactions, and surprises.

Cosmic Combat with a Twist

Blast, strafe, and barrel roll your way through enemy swarms, jet formations, colossal bosses, and enormous motherships. Use weapons, gadgets, and the environment to your advantage across multiple realities and choose your own unique approach to each mission.

Handcrafted Visual Style

Outer space as you’ve never known it. Vibrant colors, donut-shaped planets, bright stars, or even deep (rainbow) space. Every universe sector is lovingly crafted with its own comic-book flair, inspired by ’70s retro science-fiction and modern indie artistry.

A Hero and His Car

lay as a teenage driver and his loyal, fully-loaded cosmobile. Your car talks. Your car fights. Your car feels. This isn’t just your ride—it’s your best friend in the whole universe.

A Universe Full of Stories

Each sector is a self-contained comic book episode, complete with characters, conflicts, and dimensional drama. From laugh-out-loud quests to moments of surprising depth, Cosmo Tales is more than a ride—it’s an adventure you’ll want to experience.

Key Features

  • Instant dimension switching changes gameplay, art, and pretty much everything on the fly.
  • Car space combat for fast fingers and a sharp brain with multiple dimension-related moves and weapons.
  • Striking handcrafted visuals blending retro science-fiction with modern indie comic styles.
  • Bite-sized adventures in the form of unique missions, boss fights, and collectible comic books.
